topic.title: EMS Outcomes Encompassing Encounter - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] dischargeDispositionCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet InpatientDischargeDisposition STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: eOutcome.02 - Hospital Disposition

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: eOutcome.11 - Date/Time of Hospital Admission, eOutcome.16 - Date/Time of Hospital Discharge

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: eOutcome.11 - Date/Time of Hospital Admission, eOutcome.16 - Date/Time of Hospital Discharge

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] dischargeDispositionCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet InpatientDischargeDisposition STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: eOutcome.02 - Hospital Disposition
